document_data.name: Turmish Black
document_data.mainbody: '''Turmish black''' was a [[cheese]] made in [[Turmish]] in the [[Vilhon Reach]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the [[1365 DR|Year of the Sword, 1365 DR]], [[Rivaldo|Sir Rivaldo]] was traveling in a coach along the [[Trade Way]] from the [[Way Inn]] to [[Waterdeep]] with an assortment of fine cheeses, including Turmish black.
